@xworker.html.extjs.Ext.ButtonStoreAddTpl/@23358/@handler
sname
handler
Scode
#$@text#$@
var store = Ext.StoreMgr.get('${data.storeId?if_exists}');
store.insert(store.getCount(), new store.recordType({${data.values?if_exists}}));
#$@text#$@
